name: DogSounds
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dog sounds
des:
Dog Sounds features dog barking sounds from various dog breeds to make you smile and make your pet pooch get all excited.

For those with screen enabled Alexa devices you also get a bonus picture of the dog you requested :)

*** INSTRUCTIONS ***

Using the Dog Sounds Alexa Skill is easy, first enable it and then:

1. Say "Alexa, Open Dog Sounds"
2. You can then say "Alexa, play a golden retriever bark"

Currently, Dog Sounds supports the woofs, howls and barks from the following canine breeds:

Alaskan Husky
American Bulldog
American Staffordshire Terrier
Beagle
Border Collie
Cavalier King Charles Spaniel
Chihuahua
Cocker Spaniel
Dalmatian
Doberman Pinscher
English Springer Spaniel
French Bulldog
German Shepherd
Golden Retriever
Labrador Retriever
Pomeranian
Poodle
Pug
Rottweiler
Shih Tzu
Siberian Husky
Staffordshire Bull Terrier
Toy Poodle
Welsh Springer Spaniel
Yorkshire Terrier


We're adding new Dog Sounds all the time. 
To make a request or for questions or feedback, please email us at hello@topvoiceapps.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
